SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
public class TurnController extends Object
Represents a controller for the in-game-phase (manages turns).

  • Method Details

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn()
      Creates a new turn

    • getPlayerQueueUsernames

      protected ArrayList<String> getPlayerQueueUsernames()
      Returns a list of player usernames in the playerQueue.
      Returns:
      List of player usernames

    • drawPhase

      public void drawPhase(String senderUsername, MessageToServer message)
      Handles the draw phase based on the received message. If the message is not a valid DrawTilesMessage, an error message is sent. Otherwise, if the drawn tiles are valid, it draws them from the board and prepares for the insert phase.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - Username of the message sender
      message - Message containing the drawn tiles

    • isDrawHandValid

      public boolean isDrawHandValid(ArrayList<Square> items)
      Checks if the drawn hand is valid. It verifies if each square in the hand is pickable from the board and if they are in a line.
      Parameters:
      items - List of squares representing the drawn hand
      Returns:
      True if the drawn hand is valid, false otherwise

    • getPlayerQueue

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayerQueue()
      Returns:
      List of players in queue

    • loadNextPlayer

      public void loadNextPlayer()
      Loads the next player in the playerQueue. If it is the last turn and the current player is the last player in the queue, it advances the game phase to AWARDS. Otherwise, it sets the next player as the current player and starts a new turn.

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Checks if it is the last turn in the game.
      Returns:
      True if it is the last turn, false otherwise

    • triggerLastTurn

      public void triggerLastTurn()
      Triggers the last turn in the game.

    • refillPhase

      public void refillPhase()
      Handles the refill phase and loads the next player.

    • calculateCommonGoal

      public void calculateCommonGoal()
      Calculates the common goal and prepares for the refill phase.

    • insertPhase

      public void insertPhase(String senderUsername, MessageToServer message)
      Inserts the tiles in the hand in the bookshelf
      Parameters:
      message - Message containing the tiles to insert and where to insert them (column)

    • setPlayersQueue

      public void setPlayersQueue(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Sets the player queue to the specified list of players.
      Parameters:
      players - List of players in the player queue

    • addPlayerToSkip

      public void addPlayerToSkip(Player player)
      Adds the specified player to the playersToSkip list. If all players have been added to the list, the game phase is advanced to AWARDS. If the player is the current player, the next player is loaded.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to skip

    • getPlayersToSkipUsernames

      public List<String> getPlayersToSkipUsernames()
      Returns the playersToSkip list.
      Returns:
      List of players to skip

    • reconnectExitedPlayer

      public void reconnectExitedPlayer(Player player)
      Reconnects a player who has previously exited the game. Removes the player from the playersToSkip list and notifies the model that the player has rejoined.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to reconnect
